text: haey chaur anak( mou ham meat) romluk dl bangobaaun robsa ad ( hou t) nowpel del keat ban dasatuen promean krom robsa keat now aah k hv . haey chea karpit nasa banda anak dasatuen promean ban kanlong phot tow moun keat ning kraoy keat( daoy tounmean tha) chaur puok anak kom korp sakkar phe sa ng pi a l laoh aoy saoh pitabrakd nasa khnhom khlach tearounakamm now thngai da thomtheng( thngai barlok) thleak towleu puok anak
